description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，副国级领导人。曾任中共中央组织部常务副部长，现任第十四届全国政协副主席。
description.en: A political figure of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a deputy national leader. He formerly served as the Executive Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee and is currently a Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, serving as the organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会
en: 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十四届会议，任期从2023年至2028年。
description.en: The 14th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, with a term from 2023 to 2028.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管组织、干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for organizational and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, formerly served as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Executive Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个高级别职务等级，仅次于正国级。
description.en: A high-level position rank in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China, second only to the national leader level.

description.zh-cn: 对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国担任主要领导职务的党、政、军人物的统称。
description.en: A collective term for high-ranking party, government, and military figures who hold major leadership positions in the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于甘肃省的一所财经贸易类中等专业学校。
description.en: A secondary specialized school of finance and trade located in Gansu Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会
en: 19th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 19th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 全国政协的一个界别活动组织。
description.en: An activity organization of a specific sector within the National Committee of the CPPCC.

zh-cn: 中国共产党甘肃省委员会
en: Gansu Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党临夏回族自治州委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党临夏回族自治州委员会
中共临夏回族自治州委
en: Linxia Hui Autonomous Prefecture Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党福建省委员会
en: Fujian Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中央主题教育领导小组

zh-cn: 中央主题教育领导小组
en: Central Leading Group for Thematic Education

description.zh-cn: 负责“学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想”主题教育的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body responsible for the thematic education campaign on 'Studying and Implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era'.

description.zh-cn: 姜信治籍贯为甘肃敦煌。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi's ancestral home is Dunhuang, Gansu.

description.zh-cn: 通过夜校学习获得本科学历。
description.en: Obtained a bachelor's degree through night school.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会副主席。
description.en: Serves as Vice Chairman of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在王沪宁担任全国政协主席期间，姜信治担任副主席。
description.en: While Wang Huning serves as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Jiang Xinzhi serves as a Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 2015年12月至2017年11月任副部长，2017年11月升任常务副部长（正部长级）至2025年9月。
description.en: Served as Deputy Head from December 2015 to November 2017, and was promoted to Executive Deputy Head (minister level) from November 2017 to September 2025.

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，姜信治任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: While Xi Jinping serves as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Jiang Xinzhi served as the Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 姜信治接替陈希出任中共中央组织部常务副部长。陈希时任中组部部长。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Chen Xi as Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department. Chen Xi was the Head of the Organization Department at the time.

description.zh-cn: 黄建发接替姜信治出任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: Huang Jianfa succeeded Jiang Xinzhi as Executive Deputy Head of the CCP Central Organization Department.

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Head of the Organization Department

relationships.target: 中国共产党临夏回族自治州委员会
中华人民共和国国家监察委员会
中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会
中国共产党第十九届中央纪律检查委员会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 姜信治是副国级党和国家领导人。
description.en: Jiang Xinzhi is a deputy national-level party and state leader.

relationships.target: 中央主题教育领导小组

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：姜信治接替于广洲出任中共福建省委组织部部长。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Yu Guangzhou as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：王宁接替姜信治出任中共福建省委组织部部长。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Wang Ning succeeded Jiang Xinzhi as the Head of the Organization Department of the CCP Fujian Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：姜信治接替孙效东出任中共甘肃省委秘书长。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Sun Xiaodong as the Secretary-General of the CCP Gansu Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：刘立军接替姜信治出任中共甘肃省委秘书长。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Liu Lijun succeeded Jiang Xinzhi as the Secretary-General of the CCP Gansu Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 涉及两次职务交接：姜信治于2003年2月接替程正明任中共临夏州委书记，并于2006年3月接替程正明任甘肃省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Regarding two successions of office: Jiang Xinzhi succeeded Cheng Zhengming as Secretary of the CCP Linxia Prefecture Committee in February 2003, and succeeded Cheng Zhengming again as Secretary-General of the Gansu Provincial People's Government in March 2006.

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：王玺玉接替姜信治出任中共临夏州委书记。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Wang Xiyu succeeded Jiang Xinzhi as the Secretary of the CCP Linxia Prefecture Committee.

description.zh-cn: 涉及职务交接：赵春接替姜信治出任甘肃省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Regarding succession of office: Zhao Chun succeeded Jiang Xinzhi as the Secretary-General of the Gansu Provincial People's Government.
